clone.name: Pip Clone
clone.description: Choose two dice and copy the first die's value onto the second.

stasis.name: Stasis
stasis.description: Freeze the selected dice until the start of your next turn.

tinker.name: Tinker
tinker.description: Increase the value of the selected dice by 1 (dice showing 6 stay 6).

odd_attack.name: Odd Attack
odd_attack.description: Deal damage equal to the sum of all odd dice.

even_shield.name: Even Shield
even_shield.description: Gain block equal to the sum of all even dice.

strafe.name: Strafe
strafe.description: Deal 30 damage with a Small Straight or 60 damage with a Big Straight.

strike.name: Strike
strike.description: Deal damage equal to the sum of all dice.

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.description: Gain block equal to the sum of all dice.

pair_shot.name: Pair Shot
pair_shot.description: Deal 15 damage if you have any pair of dice.

one_shot.name: One Shot
one_shot.description: Deal 15 damage for each die showing 1.

double_guard.name: Double Guard
double_guard.description: Gain 10 block for each die showing 2.

tinker_plus.name: Tinker+
tinker_plus.description: Increase the value of the selected dice by 2 (dice showing 5 become 6).

reroll_plus.name: Reroll+
reroll_plus.description: Reroll the selected dice twice and keep the higher result.

strike_plus.name: Strike+
strike_plus.description: Deal damage equal to the sum of all dice plus 6.

fortify_plus.name: Fortify+
fortify_plus.description: Gain block equal to the sum of all dice plus 6.

pair_shot_plus.name: Pair Shot+
pair_shot_plus.description: Deal 25 damage if you have any pair of dice.

one_shot_plus.name: One Shot+
one_shot_plus.description: Deal 20 damage for each die showing 1.

double_guard_plus.name: Double Guard+
double_guard_plus.description: Gain 12 block for each die showing 2.
